LanguageData.OgreStack.Settings.Mode.Desc:
Fixed: Means each item that matches the category will have a stack size specified by the value.
(Good for items that are similar and have similar base stack sizes: like cloth and leather).

Scalar: Means each item that matches the category will have its base game stacksize multipled by the value.
(Good for items that are not similar or have vastly different base stack sizes: like manufactured).

LanguageData.OgreStack.Settings.Other.Title: Other
LanguageData.OgreStack.Settings.SingleThingDefTargeti: This section is only for people comfortable editing an XML file outside of RimWorld who want to set <color=#ffa500ff>Individual ThingDef</color> stackLimits that override the general stackLimits configured above above. The Overrides.xml file is located here: <color=#ffa500ff><size=13>{0}</size></color>
LanguageData.OgreStack.Settings.CSV.Title: Write Processed DefsList CSV
LanguageData.OgreStack.Settings.CSV.Desc:
Writes all the ThingDefs that are stackable, their original stack values, which ModFile modified them, final stackvalues, i.e. debug information.

Note this only happens when stacks are modified. Not just from checking this checkbox.

Output file is named OgreStack_DefsList.csv and will be located in the RimWorld savedata location in the OgreStack folder.

Location: {0}
